original_text:
Among all the children she bore
    there was none to guide her;
among all the children she reared
    there was none to take her by the hand.
korean_text: 네가 낳은 모든 아들 중에 너를 인도할 자가 없고 네가 양육한 모든 아들 중에 그 손으로 너를 이끌 자도 없도다

sentences.original_text: Among all the children she bore
there was none to guide her
among all the children she reared
there was none to take her by the hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 손을 잡아줄 자가 아무도 없었다
